verses.kjv: The Revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave unto him, to shew unto his servants things which must shortly come to pass; and he sent and signified it by his angel unto his servant John:
verses.ct: This is the revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave to him so he could show his servants what must happen soon. He communicated it by sending his angel to his servant John,

verses.kjv: Who bare record of the word of God, and of the testimony of Jesus Christ, and of all things that he saw.
verses.ct: who testified to everything he saw — the word of God and the testimony of Jesus Christ.

verses.kjv: Blessed is he that readeth, and they that hear the words of this prophecy, and keep those things which are written therein: for the time is at hand.
verses.ct: Anyone who reads the words of this prophecy out loud is blessed, and so are those who hear it and hold on to what is written in it, because the time is near.

verses.kjv: John to the seven churches which are in Asia: Grace be unto you, and peace, from him which is, and which was, and which is to come; and from the seven Spirits which are before his throne;
verses.ct: John, to the 7 churches in Asia: Grace and peace to you from the one who is, who was, and who is coming, and from the 7 Spirits who are in the presence of his throne,

verses.kjv: And from Jesus Christ, who is the faithful witness, and the first begotten of the dead, and the prince of the kings of the earth. Unto him that loved us, and washed us from our sins in his own blood,
verses.ct: and from Jesus Christ, the trustworthy witness, the firstborn from the dead, and the ruler over the kings of the earth. To the one who loves us and has freed us from our sins through his own blood,

verses.kjv: And hath made us kings and priests unto God and his Father; to him be glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.
verses.ct: and has made us a kingdom and priests serving God his Father — to him belong glory and dominion forever and ever. Amen.

verses.kjv: Behold, he cometh with clouds; and every eye shall see him, and they also which pierced him: and all kindreds of the earth shall wail because of him. Even so, Amen.
verses.ct: Look! He is coming with the clouds, and every eye will see him, including those who pierced him. All the families of the earth will mourn because of him. Yes, it will be so. Amen.

verses.kjv: I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the ending, saith the Lord, which is, and which was, and which is to come, the Almighty.
verses.ct: "I am the Alpha and the Omega, the beginning and the ending," says the Lord, who is, who was, and who is coming — the Almighty.

verses.kjv: I John, who also am your brother, and companion in tribulation, and in the kingdom and patience of Jesus Christ, was in the isle that is called Patmos, for the word of God, and for the testimony of Jesus Christ.
verses.ct: I, John, your brother and partner in the suffering, the kingdom, and the endurance that come through Jesus Christ, was on the island called Patmos because of the word of God and the testimony of Jesus Christ.

verses.kjv: I was in the Spirit on the Lord’s day, and heard behind me a great voice, as of a trumpet,
verses.ct: On the Lord's day, I was caught up in the Spirit, and I heard a powerful voice behind me that sounded like a trumpet.

verses.kjv: Saying, I am Alpha and Omega, the first and the last: and, What thou seest, write in a book, and send it unto the seven churches which are in Asia; unto Ephesus, and unto Smyrna, and unto Pergamos, and unto Thyatira, and unto Sardis, and unto Philadelphia, and unto Laodicea.
verses.ct: It said, "I am the Alpha and the Omega, the first and the last. Write down what you see in a book and send it to the 7 churches in Asia — to Ephesus, Smyrna, Pergamos, Thyatira, Sardis, Philadelphia, and Laodicea."

verses.kjv: And I turned to see the voice that spake with me. And being turned, I saw seven golden candlesticks;
verses.ct: I turned around to see who was speaking to me, and when I turned, I saw 7 golden lampstands.

verses.kjv: And in the midst of the seven candlesticks one like unto the Son of man, clothed with a garment down to the foot, and girt about the paps with a golden girdle.
verses.ct: Standing among the 7 lampstands was someone who looked like the Son of Man, wearing a robe that reached down to his feet, with a golden sash wrapped around his chest.

verses.kjv: His head and his hairs were white like wool, as white as snow; and his eyes were as a flame of fire;
verses.ct: His head and hair were white like wool, as white as snow, and his eyes blazed like flames of fire.

verses.kjv: And his feet like unto fine brass, as if they burned in a furnace; and his voice as the sound of many waters.
verses.ct: His feet glowed like polished bronze refined in a furnace, and his voice roared like the sound of rushing waters.

verses.kjv: And he had in his right hand seven stars: and out of his mouth went a sharp twoedged sword: and his countenance was as the sun shineth in his strength.
verses.ct: He held 7 stars in his right hand, and a sharp double-edged sword came out of his mouth. His face shone like the sun at full intensity.

verses.kjv: And when I saw him, I fell at his feet as dead. And he laid his right hand upon me, saying unto me, Fear not; I am the first and the last:
verses.ct: When I saw him, I collapsed at his feet as though I were dead. But he placed his right hand on me and said, "Don't be afraid. I am the first and the last.

verses.kjv: I am he that liveth, and was dead; and, behold, I am alive for evermore, Amen; and have the keys of hell and of death.
verses.ct: I am the living one. I was dead, but look — I am alive forever and ever! Amen. I hold the keys of death and of hell.

verses.kjv: Write the things which thou hast seen, and the things which are, and the things which shall be hereafter;
verses.ct: So write down what you have seen, what is happening now, and what will take place after this.

verses.kjv: The mystery of the seven stars which thou sawest in my right hand, and the seven golden candlesticks. The seven stars are the angels of the seven churches: and the seven candlesticks which thou sawest are the seven churches.
verses.ct: Here is the meaning of the mystery: the 7 stars you saw in my right hand and the 7 golden lampstands — the 7 stars are the angels of the 7 churches, and the 7 lampstands are the 7 churches."
